name: DJ Mix Pads
description: DJ Mix Pads is an awesome launchpad and music creator. Choose your genre, hit on pads and make your own EDM songs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
